extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the system is affected by the vulnerabilities by retrieving the installed version of Cisco Nexus Dashboard.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system running Cisco Nexus Dashboard version 1.1 or later?
Is the system running Cisco Nexus Dashboard version 1.1?

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade to Cisco Nexus Dashboard 2.2(1e)
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade to the fixed software release 2.2(1e) to address the vulnerabilities.
